</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Pantograph Gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=172)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The striking surface of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [pantograph gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=172)_ releases a puff of fire each time it reaches the end of its linkage.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You supercharge the gauntlet's attack. Make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra two dice of weapon damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
